Description: GIBSON EPIPHONE DOT NA SEMI HOLLOWBODY 6 STRING ELECTRIC GUITAR MADE IN KOREA 2010 THIS GUITAR IS IN GOOD SHAPE AND IS IN 100% WORKING CONDITION. NO CRACKS OR BREAKS AGED PERFECTLY SWEET GREAT TONE AND DYNAMICS THERE ARE SOME MINOR SCRATCHES ON THE BODY. THE NECK IS STRAIGHT AND THIS GUITAR PLAYS GREAT!. SUPER TONE GROVER TUNERS Locking Bridge very sturdy and stays in tune PLEASE VIEW THE IMAGES AND FEEL FREE TO ASK ANY QUESTIONS. We are coming back online to eBay customers after some years away. We offer quality Instruments at fair market value prices, We would also like to say that we are a small company and We show that through our attention to quality and craftsmanship, As of right now we are cleaning out a lot of items that were pushed into a room and then forgotten.
